mapper.sql: id, item_id, pn, barcode, name, uom, pack_quantity, bill_id, bill_code, bill_type, origin_bill, origin_bill_type, product_date, receipt_date, batch_attr, warehouse, section, location, target_warehouse, target_section, target_location, plan_quantity, real_quantity, pallet_code, adjust_quantity, origin_id, stock_id, lock_id, org_code, org_type, dual_quantity,batch_code, target_org_code, target_org_type, status, cost_price, cost_total, enter_at
mapper.insert:
insert into WM_WORK_DETAIL (bill_id, item_id, pn, barcode, pallet_code, name, uom, pack_quantity, bill_code, bill_type, origin_bill, origin_bill_type, product_date, receipt_date, batch_attr, warehouse, section, location, target_warehouse, target_section, target_location, plan_quantity, real_quantity, adjust_quantity, origin_id, stock_id, lock_id, org_code, org_type, target_org_code, target_org_type, status, batch_code, cost_price, cost_total, enter_at ) values (#{billId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location.pallet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uom.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uom.packQuantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bill.billCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bill.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin.billCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{origin.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{receiptDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{batchAttr,typeHandler=com.an.core.mybatis.handlers.JsonTypeHandler}, #{location.warehouse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{location.sectionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location.locationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target.warehouse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{target.sectionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target.locationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planQuantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{realQuantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{adjustQuantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{originId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{belong.orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{belong.orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyB.orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyB.orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{costTotal,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, now() )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS id
mapper.select: select count(*) from WM_WORK_DETAIL where bill_id = #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from WM_WORK_DETAIL where bill_code = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update WM_WORK_DETAIL set pn = #{pn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, barcode = #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uom = #{uom.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pallet_code = #{location.pallet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pack_quantity = #{uom.packQuantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, bill_id = #{billId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bill_code = #{bill.billCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_type = #{bill.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin_bill = #{origin.billCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, origin_bill_type = #{origin.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_date = #{productDate,jdbcType=DATE}, receipt_date = #{receiptDate,jdbcType=DATE}, batch_attr = #{batchAttr,typeHandler=com.an.core.mybatis.handlers.JsonTypeHandler}, warehouse = #{location.warehouse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, section = #{location.sectionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location.locationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_warehouse = #{target.warehouse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, target_section = #{target.sectionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_location = #{target.locationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_quantity = #{planQuantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, real_quantity = #{realQuantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, adjust_quantity = #{adjustQuantity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stock_id = #{stockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, lock_id = #{lockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, org_code = #{belong.orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_type = #{belong.orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_org_code = #{partyB.orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_org_type = #{partyB.orgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_code = #{batchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, cost_total = #{costTotal,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, enter_at = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update WM_WORK_DETAIL a set dual_quantity = ( select sum(b.real_quantity) from WM_WORK_DETAIL b where b.status not in ('trash') and b.origin_bill = #{value} and b.origin_id = a."id") where a.bill_code = #{value} and exists (select 1 from WM_WORK_DETAIL b where b.origin_bill = #{value} and b.origin_id = a."id")
